name: HeartBeats (Hyperagon)
description:
A fun casual game I made. Holding the NFTs will give you continues but only the version on our website can do so.

The keys are simple as you can either Beat or Skip. The following keyboard keys are mapped to those:

Beat

  • Up/Down
  • W/S
  • Space

Skip

  • Left/Right
  • A/D
  • Ctrl

There are mouse/touch controls for the UI as well but these are explained in the introductory screen.
